data.eml:eml: New host records and descriptions of five new species of Myrsidea Waterston, 1915 (Phthiraptera: Menoponidae) from passerine birds (Aves: Passeriformes)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Valim, Michel P., Price, Roger D., Johnson, Kevin P. (2011): New host records and descriptions of five new species of Myrsidea Waterston, 1915 (Phthiraptera: Menoponidae) from passerine birds (Aves: Passeriformes). Zootaxa 3097: 1-19, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202624
